## TimerManager.setTimer() method

Creates a new timer and returns its ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setTimer(name: string, delay: number, fn: Function): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Readable name for the timer |
|  delay | number | Delay in milliseconds |
|  fn | Function | Callback function that is executed after the timer expires |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
